title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You strive to discover a balance between independence and dependence within your relationship world. You might try to put a little distance between you and the people who are too reliant on you. You desire more time for personal pursuits while the Aries Full Moon illuminates your 1st House of Self. Perhaps you resent someone's neediness now, and yearn for total freedom from anyones attachments. Yet, breaking away too abruptly can cause confusion and harm. Take a simple concrete step that allows for both more self-expression and full recognition that youre also intimately tied to those you hold dear. John Donne wrote, No man is an island. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
